name: Array
description: Pineapple and citrus. White grapes and lime zest aroma.
hops: BRU-1, Nelson Sauvin™, Motueka™, Pacific Sunrise™

name: Tides
description: Mango, passionfruit, lime zest, citrus, and blueberry.

name: Scylla
description: Dark chocolate and toasted caramel layered on blackberry cola.

name: Sebastian
description: A Maibock brewed with 100% Pilsner malt and German and American Noble Hops.

name: Revive
description: Modern, hopped version of a traditional Finnish fermented-water beverage.

name: Glyphs
description: Tangerine, orange zest, and aromatic pine.

name: Dom
description: Crisp ale with floral and pear notes, subtle grapefruit zest aroma.

name: Secrets
description: Pineapple, peach, bubblegum, and citrus.

name: Soleil
description: Dry orange, mimosa-esque. Floral notes and funky.

name: Terrini
description: Grassy, floral, and pithy orange aromas. Notes of pear, candied orange, and lemongrass flavors. Slightly sweet finish.

name: Kimik
description: Notes of heavy citrus, passion fruit, lychee, and a distinct guava aroma.

name: Lupula
description: Pineapple, mango, and grapefruit. Aromatic.

name: Melrose
description: Smooth and malty with light caramel and dark fruit notes with subtle cherry aroma.

name: Carnyx
description: Balanced richness, notes of coffee, and chocolate. A smooth, and creamy texture.

name: Alma
description: A radiant golden straw hue, with a robust all-malt foundation. A refreshing crispness is complemented by delicate floral and citrus notes that emerge in the finish.

name: Elias
description: Smooth, subtle citrus notes and floral aroma.

name: Brahms
description: A gentle roast that harmonizes with a medium-bodied crispness. Delicately balanced by a mild herbal bitterness.

name: Bresa
description: Tart ale with notes of lemon, lime, sea salt and coriander.

name: Marty
description: Light matcha-steeped, crisp ale.

name: Narada
description: Dank citrus and pine notes.

name: Pomona
description: Tart ale fruited with cherry and raspberry.

name: Pomona
description: Tart ale fruited with mango and peach.

name: Waves
description: Stonefruit and citrus, juicy finish. Blueberry and melon aroma.
hops: El Dorado®, Ekuanot®, Citra®, Mosaic®, Simcoe®

name: Terra
description: Orange zest, marmalade, and grapefruit. Floral and spicy.

name: Onsite I
description: Onsite I is the first of our pilot program. A raspberry fruited smoothie sour. No lactose.

name: Demeter
description: Cognac, candied orange, and caramel.

name: Flux
description: Bubble gum, papaya, blueberry, and dank citrus. Aromas of cannabis, grapefruit, stonefruit, and orange zest.

name: Remo
description: Light, citrus-forward summer crusher.

name: Sonnen
description: Plush tan head, a subtle sweetness of toasted malt, medium body.

name: Iroh
description: Subtle matcha and citrus.

name: Revada
description: Conditioned on strawberries, blueberries & hibiscus. Thicc and tart. Vibrant pink and full bodied.

name: Taupō
description: Tropical passion fruit, red grapefruit, and zested orange.

name: Zama
description: Pineapple, tangerine, mango.

name: Drip
description: White grape, grapefruit and orange.  Adjuncted with Phantasm

name: Solem
description: Funky and dry. Pineapple, leather, and ripe peach.

name: Hanno
description: Resinous, douglas fir with citrus and lychee.

name: Grandar
description: Crackery sweetness balanced with hops, floral and herbal notes that finish with a subtle citrus. Step mashed and hopped with nobles.

name: Levenator
description: Rich malt flavor with notes of toasted caramel, dark fruit, and chocolate.

name: Rubico
description: Pineapple, peach rings, bubblegum, strawberry and citrus.

name: Orban
description: Caramel, orange, dark chocolate and vanilla. Conditioned on cracked Madagascar vanilla beans and Cocoa nibs.

name: Severina
description: Infused with Amaretti cookies. Notes of ginger, cinnamon, and caramel. Collab with Severina for the Lawrenceville Cookie Tour.

name: Double Lupula
description: More hops, more malt, more everything. Everything Lupula is and more.

name: Prismatic
description: Pineapple, vanilla, tangerine, melon.

name: Vespero
description: Roasted chestnut, chocolate and raisin. Ruby hue and a hint of noble hops.

name: Altamir
description: Berry, Citrus, and floral.

name: Saisar
description: Mixed fermentation saison, foeder-aged for six months on our house microflora.

name: Medusa
description: Collaboration with Dollfaced Aesthetics. Our Gose blends the tartness of ripe raspberries with the subtle floral notes of rose.

name: Firnara
description: Orange, lemon zest, dank, piney and resinous.

name: Espressar
description: Biscuity, toasty, caramel, coffee, and vanilla. Conditioned on Peruvian coffee beans.

name: Marty II
description: Our annual St. Patrick's Day green beer, this year, built on top of heavy malt ratio of wheat. Adjuncted with Matcha.

name: Tros
description: Pineapple, mint, mandarin orange and mango.

name: Faust
description: Slightly sour, dry and oaky. Aged in oak foeders on our house microflora and conditioned on fresh plums.

name: Rein
description: Refreshing smooth malt backbone with fruit notes and floral aroma.

name: Hurron
description: Enhanced with thiol-enriched Motueka from Freestyle Hops x Phantasm. Peach, pineapple and white grape.

name: Stark
description: Rich maltiness with caramel and toast. Spice with floral aroma.

name: Crest
description: Citrus, tropical, and stone fruit flavors, floral and piney undertones.

name: Summer Lupula
description: Summer variant of Lupula, lower alcohol, more citrus-forward. Pineapple and mango.

name: Tribute
description: Orange, tangerine, basil, earthy. Citrus and sunflower aroma. Dry hopped with this year's Ales for ALS hop blend. $2 donated to "Ales for ALS" per 4-Pack.

name: Gosev
description: Tart ale with notes of lemon, lime, sea salt and coriander. Lightly conditioned on Raspberries.

name: Aurantia
description: Double IPA hopped with our favorite lot of Citra.

name: Double Prismatic
description: Tangerine zest, pineapple, raspberry, and lemongrass.

name: Sinos
description: Orange peel, coriander, and lemongrass, finished with clean grapefruit zest.

name: DDH Double Prismatic
description: Notes of Tangerine zest, pineapple, and raspberry. Double dry-hopped.

name: Dōmbōc
description: Chocolate, caramel, dark fruit with a malty sweetness with full body.

name: Zwickel Grandar
description: Grandar fresh from the fermenter. Crisp, easy drinking and unfiltered.

name: Jantar
description: Medium bodied lager with rich caramel sweetness, toast with a smooth, spicy finish.

name: Verus
description: Tropical fruit notes balanced with pear, melon, blueberry and citrus.

name: Priscus
description: Sauvignon blanc, blueberry and citrus.

name: Époque
description: Aged 18 months in oak foeders, and conditioned on tart and Maraschino cherries. Notes of dark fruit, caramel, oak, and cherry, finishes tart and crisp.

name: Imara
description: Tropical fruit, juicy pineapple, white wine, and citrus zest.
hops: Idaho 7™, Simcoe®, Cascade CGX™, Nelson Sauvin™

name: Demeter Red Wax
description: Aged for 12 months in Hemingway Papa's Pilar Rum barrels. Notes of brûléed sugar crust—rounded out by dried fruit undertones.

name: Demeter Green Wax
description: Aged for 12 months in BLiS™ Cinnamon Maple Syrup Bourbon Barrels. Oven fresh pecan pie, maple-syrup-on a spoon unctuosity, with a warming cinnamon candy finish.

name: Demeter Gold Wax
description: Aged for 12 months in Abraham Smith Bowman bourbon finishing barrels, previously port. Notes of honeyed malt, black cherry and oak, with a touch of port sweetness.

name: Samo
description: Pours pale gold with subtle bread aromas, balanced by floral and spicy notes and a touch of lemon zest.

name: DuPloughman
description: Small batch collaboration with our friends at Ploughman Cider, using their yeast to ferment. Simple yet bold saison with a strong apple backbone.

name: Vindobona
description: Hints of caramel and biscuit, balanced by mild earthy hops, a crisp medium-light body, and a clean, dry finish.

name: Costilla
description: Dark with toffee and lime. Brewed with Wapsi Valley naturally-pollinated heirloom corn.

name: Daltonico
description: Slightly roasty body, with notes of subtle pine, citrus, with chocolate undertones.
hops: Cascade CGX™, Erebus™, Idaho 7™, Nelson Sauvin™

name: Akko
description: Pineapple and orange mango, bursting with peach ring candies.

name: Wairua
description: Collaboration with our friends at Swiftwater Brewing. Pineapple, juicy citrus, mango, and stone fruit.

name: Edo
description: Crisp, gentle, and easy drinking from a rice malt base, this lager has floral and herbal notes, finishing dry and refreshingly smooth.

name: Phokas
description: Tropical and citrusy with hints of pine and white grape. Light, juicy, and easy-drinking.
